relationship_id.description:
User Guidance: The type of relationship captured by the
relationship record.

is_hierarchical.description:
User Guidance: Defines whether a relationship defines
concepts into classes or hierarchies. Values
are 1 for hierarchical relationship or 0 if not.

defines_ancestry.description:
User Guidance: Defines whether a hierarchical relationship
contributes to the concept_ancestor table.
These are subsets of the hierarchical
relationships. Valid values are 1 or 0.

reverse_relationship_id.description:
User Guidance: The identifier for the relationship used to
define the reverse relationship between two
concepts.

relationship_concept_id.description:
User Guidance: A foreign key that refers to an identifier in
the [CONCEPT](https://ohdsi.github.io/CommonDataModel/cdm54.html#concept) table for the unique
relationship concept.
